vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 1501 for a private school on property zoned an R-7.5(A) Single Family District, on the south line of Samuell Boulevard, east of South Buckner Boulevard
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a permanent time period, subject to an amended site plan, an amended traffic management plan, and amended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a permanent time period, subject to an amended site plan, an amended traffic management plan, and amended conditions
Z212-303(JA)
